title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Make modifications to the file (for example, move an existing class).
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon.
4) A dialog will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename in the dialog box, but ignore the file extension, as it is not requested.
7) Click 'Ok'.
Observed Behavior: The file is successfully added to the specified location in the Navigator, but no file extension is shown.
